Your all-in-one tweak for BBM Messenger!

Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11

BBMEasy will make BBM much easier and simpler to use.




- Save Any Image From Feeds
- Copy Any Text From Profile
- Copy Text Comment From Feeds
... and More


- Hide Read Receipt
- Disable Retract Messages
- Unlimited Time for Timer Messages
- Call Confirm
- Old Style for Chatting
... and More


- Add Background Image
- Hide Ads
- Add Blur To Banner
- Change Keyboard To Black
... and More

I will add new Features very soon.

The tweak is available in English, Arabic.

Configure options from Settings.
